description: Structured information on a brain atlas (version level).
label: Brain atlas version
name: BrainAtlasVersion

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/annot._instruction: Add all annotations that belong to this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/annot.description: Collection of notes or markings, each added by way of comment or explanation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/annot.label: Annotation set
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/annot.name: annotationSet

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/coord._instruction: Add the coordinate space in which this brain atlas version exists in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/coord.description: Two or three dimensional geometric setting.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/coord.label: Coordinate space
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/coord.name: coordinateSpace

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.label: Digital identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.name: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.label: Full name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.name: fullName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAl._instruction: Add one or several alternative versions to this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAl.label: Has alternative version
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAl.name: hasAlternativeVersion

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this brain atlas.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.description: Main website of something or someone.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.label: Homepage
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.name: homepage

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew._instruction: Add the earlier version of this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.description: Reference to a previous (potentially outdated) particular form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.label: Is new version of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.name: isNewVersionOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.label: Ontology identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.name: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea._instruction: Enter the date of first publication of this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.description: Fixed date on which a product is due to become or was made available for the general public to see or buy
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.label: Release date
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.name: releaseDate

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.label: Short name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.name: shortName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/termi._instruction: Add the terminology used for this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/termi.description: Nomenclature for a particular field of study.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/termi.label: Terminology
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/termi.name: terminology

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version innovation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionInnovation
